articles.title: About Me
articles.contents:
Katie Munster
          
          
          Home
          About Me
          Data portfolio
          CV
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              About Me
            
            
              
                
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Professional experience
            My experience is primarily in mathematics, data analysis, and data privacy. I previously worked as a Technology Consultant at Ernst & Young, and I recently began my studies at the Bren School to pursue my passions for the environment and solving environmental problems. At Bren, I am specializing in Coastal Marine Resources Management. I am interested in marine conservation and fisheries management and am eager to use my data analysis skills to enhance natural resource management.
            
            
            Hobbies
            In my free time, I enjoy water activities and spending time by the ocean. Fishing and stand-up paddle boarding are my favorites! I have grown up fishing for rainbow trout and kokanee salmon in Lake Tahoe, but my favorite fishing spot is off the coast of Maui, where I caught a wahoo!

articles.title: Katie Munster
articles.contents:
Katie Munster
          
          
          Home
          About Me
          Data portfolio
          CV
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Katie Munster
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            I am a Master’s student at the Bren School of Environmental Science & Management, specializing in Coastal Marine Resources Management. I graduated summa cum laude from Syracuse University in 2019 with a Bachelor of Science in Applied Mathematics and Information Management and Technology. During my undergraduate career, I completed a thesis project, for which I used programming and data analysis skills to study the effect of citizen science applications on the marine plastic pollution crisis. This project was inspired by my semester abroad in college, where I was fortunate to learn from marine scientists in Spain and Morocco, as well as my previous experiences with a local marine research and education foundation. Upon college graduation, I worked as a Technology Consultant in the Cybersecurity practice at Ernst & Young, LLP. Now at the Bren School, I am focusing on solving environmental problems and hoping to step into the natural resource management space.
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Katie Munster
